Literature.Title: Small lipopeptides possess anti-biofilm capability comparable to daptomycin and vancomycin.
Literature.Author: Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Wang G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=3.1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>50µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>50µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>50µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 200(MIC=25µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 400(MIC=25µM),Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MIC=1.56µM),Staphylococcus aureus MU50(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=6.2-12.5µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=12.5µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>25µM),Candida glabrata ATCC 2001(MIC=>25µM),Candida tropicalis ATCC 13803(MIC=>25µM)
